changeSet.author: k.runets
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE vehicle ( id uuid primary key DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4 (), model uuid, odometer text, sale_date date, seller_id UUID, vin text, lot_number text, other_info_id UUID, key_amount integer, series text, start_date date );

changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE model_lookup ( id uuid primary key DEFAULT uuid_generate_v4 (), make uuid, model text, vehicle_type_id UUID, body_style_type_id UUID, fuel_type_id UUID, transmission_type_id UUID );
